turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi there, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a tall espresso with.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: sugar and sprinkles.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, before i take down your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where do you want to place this order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On Starbucks on 4th Street in Des Moines, Iowa.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what was the order again?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Espresso with sugar and sprinkles.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A tall one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: unfortunately, starbucks does not have sprinkles.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: but i got the rest of your order down.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, well that's fine.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. You can I don't need to sprinkle for that. No, that's it. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you want a tall espresso with sugar from starbucks on fourth street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that all correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The total will be $3.40.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to purchase now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please. I will pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, it's all set. Your drink will be ready at the starbucks for pick up in 7 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, okay. Thank you. I appreciate that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else i can help with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok cool.
